channel.title: Gis on Dripping Data
channel.description: Recent content in Gis on Dripping Data

item.title: King Tides Citizen Science Project
item.description: I read in the newspaper that the University of Hawaii was recruiting “citizen scientists” to help document the impact of this week’s “king tides” on our coastline. I uploaded some photos to the website but also found that we could download the dataset. I took this as an opportunity to learn something about geographic information systems (GIS) and R, and the end result was a pretty nice map of all the places that were photographed this week.
